section.name: What is Close Editor Tabs Left and Right - VCS Extension?
section.p: This plugin is an extension for VCS related close actions to the Close Editor Tabs Left and Right Plugin for NetBeans. As those actions relate on version specific NetBeans plugins, there are different versions for different NetBeans runtime versions. This Plugin is meant to be used for all NetBeans versions from NetBeans 11 until NetBeans 21.

ul.li: Adds a context menu action which lets the user close all editor tabs at once that have not been commited to their version control system (Git, SVN and Mercurial supported).
Adds a context menu action which lets the user close all version control "Diff" or "Search History" editor tabs at once (Git, SVN and Mercurial supported).
